value:
My parents are no longer with me. My
mother went off to battle, but only her
wyvern Minerva returned...$k$pAnd she had suffered many wounds.

I only came here so I could release
Minerva—not to get caught up in the
affairs of some other world.$k$pSo why is it I must help you?

You work too hard. Why is that?
You're from another world as well, are
you not?

As a Summoner, maybe you can call
upon my deceased parents... No,
forget I said anything. It's foolish...

The ends of my cloak were beginning
to fray, so I was mending the fabric.$k$p...You look surprised to learn I can
sew.

You are $Nu?
Greetings from
$Nf.$k$pIs sending people back and forth like
this fun for you?

You seem pleased as well,
Minerva.
It's a start.

...Hmph. Fate is feeling stingy
today.

This is much too valuable. Maybe
someone else should have it.

I'm Gerome, Cherche's son. You
should know I have no intention of
getting involved with this world.

You've come to chat yet again? Some
people just can't take a hint.$k$pAnd now it seems Minerva has taken
a liking to you, against my wishes.$k$pYet, I suppose I cannot be cruel to
someone Minerva approves of.$k$pAs I've said before, I have no desire
to meddle in the affairs of other
worlds. If Askr is destined to fall...$k$pthen so be it.$k$pHowever, if you truly wish to protect
this world and its inhabitants, then
Minerva and I will be by your side.$k$pAfter all... We understand the pain of
loss all too well.
せいっ！
はあっ！
ぐうっ…！
Fate is...cruel...
Embrace your fate.
This is farewell.
Pathetic...
Minerva, now!
Cruel fate...
Hmm...
I am not here to make friends.
How did I get to this point?
My wyvern is lovely, is she not?
This is not my only mask—if you broke this one, I'd still be covered.
I've seen too much of fate's cruel work to doubt it.
I wanted parents—instead I got heroic martyrs...
I must feed Minervykins before bed—oh! Forget you heard that!
Understood.
Very well.
Minerva.
